com.adobe.creativesdk.foundation.auth

Class AdobeAuthSessionLauncher

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.adobe.creativesdk.foundation.auth.AdobeAuthSessionLauncher

  • public class AdobeAuthSessionLauncher
extends java.lang.Object
    AdobeAuthSessionLauncher provides necessary information to launch the User Auth UI. This is passed as an argument to AdobeUXAuthManager.login(). Note that User Auth UI can either be launched from an Activity or a Service.Both can not be used at the same time.
    See Also:
    AdobeUXAuthManager.login(AdobeAuthSessionLauncher)

    • Nested Class Summary

      Nested Classes 
      Modifier and Type Class and Description
      static class  AdobeAuthSessionLauncher.Builder
      The builder object used to construct an AdobeAuthSessionLauncher object.
